item.title: By: David Charles
item.dc:creator: David Charles
item.description: Dr. Waldron is a great man and has a wonderful Christian mind. However, when he condemns non-instrumental hymnody as extreme, he condemns the overwhelming Puritan and Reformed witness on this issue (not to mention most of catholic orthodoxy). The truth is that those churches that have the "band" are the extreme practice.
